site_name: 42 - 44 High Road Leyton, Stratford, London, E15 2BP
description: Change of use from garage, retail and residential (Class B1c/A1/C3) to5 self-contained flats (2 x 2 bed and 3 x 1 bed) (Class C3). Part demolition of garage and construction of part single, part two-storey rear extension, hip to gable side roof extension and rear dormer. Minor excavation to increase usable floor area and headroom of existing basements, installation of new fenestration to all elevationsand two roof lights to main front roof slope. Construction of new boundary walls, cycle parking and refuse storage to front. Installation of green roof to ground floor rear extension and solar PVpanels to roof at side elevation.(Amended Description)
